name: Light Dash (TheDoritoDom)
description:
Description:

In the deadly mines, where men once mined, Doctor Henry Micheal's traverses the hollow in search for precious treasure, with his trusty torch on hand, Henry will uncover treasures and face of against deadly traps and enemies in his way but watch out... once the torch dies, Henry will... die!

This game is a submission for the Global GameJam 2021, the game was developed in one weekend.

How to Play:
  • A/D or Left and Right Arrow Key to Move
  • W or Space for Jump
  • Left Mouse Hold to shine light
  • When using Light, use A/D or Left and Right Arrow Keys to Change Direction
  • P to Pause Game
Credits:
  • Font: https://somepx.itch.io/humble-fonts-free
  • Art :https://yanao87.itch.io/cave-platformer-tileset
  • Collectibles: https://thewisehedgehog.itch.io/thip
  • Traps: https://kvsr.itch.io/traps
  • Music: https://joshua-mclean.itch.io/music-pack-7
